venue: Autism Family Network Center, 123 Autism Lane, San Francisco, CA 94103
steps: Welcome the children with a friendly greeting.
Guide them to the seating area and provide a brief introduction to the activity.
Begin the storytelling session with simple, engaging stories.
Encourage children to participate by asking questions about the story.
Provide sensory breaks if any child feels overwhelmed.
End the session with a short game related to the story.
safety: Ensure the room is free from any sharp objects and maintain a calm environment to avoid sensory overload.
